name: Color Rhythm Dancing Ball Run
description:
Color Rhythm: Dancing Ball Run is an exciting music color game. Listen to popular music and lead the ball rush to the same-color targets. With various types of music and colorful visual design, this game is a good choice for your casual time!

※ HOW TO PLAY※ Color Rhythm: Dancing Ball Run

🎵 Lead the ball to the same-color targets

🎵 Be careful! The ball will change its color sometimes.

🎵 Feel the music and beats. Headphones are recommended 🎧

※ GAME FEATURES※ Color Rhythm: Dancing Ball Run

🎵 So-easy to control. One-finger to play.

🎵 500+ Hot songs for you to play with.

🎵 Various types of music from all over the world!

🎵 Amazing 3D scenes and lighting effects!

Color Rhythm: Dancing Ball Run is an exciting music color game. Download and play this amazing game now. Come on, the music lovers!
